name: Falling!!
description:
Falling is a game where you have to guide the astronaut through obstacles tilting your device. Fire, ice, moving, breakable and many more kinds of floors prevent our character to survive!

- Easy to use tilt controls,
- Six types of floors and gravity fields along your way,
- Powerups and bonuses for extra points,
- Game goes faster and faster over time on seamless levels,
- And share your scores to Facebook and show them on Game Center!

Developed by:
- Bélgica de la Torre
- Gianmarco Ortiz
- Giacomo Preciado
- Ruy Hinostroza
